title: Radio Replay: Creative Differences
description: What happens when we connect with people whose view of the world is very different from our own? We look at the links between diversity, conflict, and creativity.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
content:encoded: What happens when we connect with people whose view of the world is very different from our own? We look at the links between diversity, conflict, and creativity.
